body:
Hey! This was a topic I’ve wanted to make for a long time now I feel it’s a good time since the playoffs are just around the corner. peachyyas (99250) and I will try to keep this topic updated throughout the rest of the regular season and in the playoffs.
Also if you have any opinions about who you think will make the post season or which team will win the Stanley cup feel free to post! 
Standings – More statistics for the standings can be found on the NHL’s website: http://www.nhl.com 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NHL Eastern Conference

Atlantic Division

1. Montreal Canadians (In)
2. Tampa Bay (In)
3. Detroit Red Wings (In)

Metropolitan Division

1. New York Rangers (In)
2. New York Islanders (In)
3. Washington Capitals (In)

Wild Card

1. Ottawa Senators (In)
2.Pittsburgh Penguins

NHL Western Conference

Central Division

1. St. Louis Blues (In)
2. Nashville Predators  (In)
3. Chicago BlackHawks (In)

Pacific Division

1. Anaheim Ducks (In)
2. Vancouver Canucks (In)
3. Calgary Flames (In)

Wild Card

1. Minnesota Wild (In)
2. Winnipeg Jets (In)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Good luck to all teams and may the best NHL team win! :)

replies.body: Just wanted to bump this rather than make a new topic. The season ends of Saturday most of the teams have already made the playoffs just a few need one more point/win.
replies.body_tagged: Just wanted to bump this rather than make a new topic. The season ends of Saturday most of the teams have already made the playoffs just a few need one more point/win.

replies.body:
Ending the night the LA Kings have been eliminated from the 2015 playoffs with a 3-1 loss to the Calgary Flames. Calgary returns to the playoffs for the first time in six years and will play the Vancouver Canucks in the first round.

Ottawa Senators need one point to clinch a playoff spot after beating the New York Rangers 3-0. Ottawa's next game on Saturday against the Philadelphia Flyers where they need just one point to return to the playoffs for the first time in two seasons.

The Winnipeg Jets have also made the playoffs after a 1-0 loss to the Colorado Avalanche. This will be Winnipeg's first time ever in the playoffs since re locating in 2011.
replies.body_tagged:

Ottawa Senators need one point to clinch a playoff spot after beating the New York Rangers 3-0. Ottawa's next game on Saturday against the Philadelphia Flyers where they need just one point to return to the playoffs for the first time in two seasons.

The Winnipeg Jets have also made the playoffs after a 1-0 loss to the Colorado Avalanche. This will be Winnipeg's first time ever in the playoffs since re locating in 2011.
